summary: Popular Broadway actor Gary Johnston is recruited by the elite counter-terrorism organization Team America: World Police. As the world begins to crumble around him, he must battle with terrorists, celebrities and falling in love.
cast: Trey Parker|Matt Stone|Kristen Miller|Masasa Moyo|Daran Norris|Phil Hendrie|Maurice LaMarche|Chelsea Marguerite|Jeremy Shada|Fred Tatasciore|John D. Kim|Paul Louis|Christine Papalexis|Elle Russ
title: Team America: La policía del mundo
